item.title: 为什么说一个全新的操作系统是必要的？
item.description: 注：此文是 OSv 官网介绍的文章，感觉对于理解 OSv 很有帮助，特翻译如下，原文地址 Today’s cloud-based applications run a heavyweight stack: the hypervisor, which divides the hardware resources among virtual machines; the operating system, which divides the virtual machine’s resources among applications; and the application server, which divides the application’s resources among the end users. 当今的云应用都运行在一个非常重的技术栈上： Hypervisor (虚拟机管理程序) ，要将硬件资
